page.title: 14THE SHOP CONTINUED.
page.content: The shopkeeper gets most of the food from the Cash and Carry warehouse.A baker delivers bread once a week,the butcher calls twice a week and greengrocery is delivered during the night so that it is fresh to sell in the morning.The milkman delivers milk and a local farm provides cream. The shop is open before 09.00hrs.so that the children can call before school and closes at 17.30hrs.or when the last customer leaves.It is closed for one hour at dinner time,on Saturday afternoon and all day Sunday. The Post Office is also open at these times and does all the things that an ordinary Post Office does.
